original_text: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus,
korean_text: 그러므로 형제들아 우리가 예수의 피를 힘입어 성소에 들어갈 담력을 얻었나니

sentences.original_text: Having therefore, brethren, boldness to enter
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 형제들아, 담대히 들어갈 수 있으니

sentences.original_text: into the holiest by the blood of Jesus,
